title: Soredake Kai
description:
1. Object of Desire
When one is looking for love, where can she find it? Problems arise as Kako finds herself as an object of desire for men all around. Can she ever break what men are after and find real love?

2. Lovey-Dovey
A girl who loves text messages falls in love with an unfaithful guy but keeps him in check with her constant texts.

3. Oil & Water
The story of a smart, spunky girl who can't handle falling in love.

4. With Lemon

5. Maid For Love
A girl who works at a maid cafe is invited to a party with her boyfriend's job.

6. Summer Prince
When a cute foreigner comes to stay at Mami's house, she's desperate to make him interested in her.

matches.title: Mangetsu no Yoru ni Akuma no Kiss
